entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Poplar River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:15 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
